2018-2019 SEASON

Our first season was an absolute roller coaster of excitement! After winning our first award, the Winning Alliance, for 1st place in the robot game with our alliance, we went on to win the Connect Award, for a groundbreaking impact on the local cities and communities in the Bay Area. We even qualified for regionals, but unfortunately experienced a horrific technical difficulty that left our robot disconnected from our controllers and completely paralyzed. We have since used this failure as a learning experience, converting our disappointment into motivation. We were still glad that our hard work took us to regionals after all!

*We have rebranded our team since this season*
